content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace group at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### Coal and iron ore processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Inserter (position a) that puts iron ore into the first stone furnace (position x1)
- Inserter (position b) that puts iron ore into the second stone furnace (position x2)
- Inserter (position c) that puts coal into the second stone furnace (position x2)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to inventory management
- Regularly check your inventory to avoid overloading or running out of necessary materials.
